story_parts.text: The lion was very excited to go to the city. He had always wanted to see what it was like. When he got there, he was amazed at all the sights and sounds. He walked around for a while, taking everything in. Eventually, he got tired and decided to go back home. He was glad he had finally gotten to see the city, and he would definitely be back soon.
